AtlasInterface.name: IA6 General

Component.classes: ia-panel ia-panel-header ia-map-toolbar ia-map-labels ia-map-copyright ia-map-selection-opacity ia-map-highlight-opacity
Component.name: Map
Component.Description: The map component of the report. For more information see here .

Property.description: The title
Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(map)' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: Visible At Startup?

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Can it be exported to an image?
Property.name: Exportable?

Property.description: popover:Any map copyright text
Property.name: Map Copyright

Property.description: The path to any background images
Property.name: Background Folder

Property.description: The maximum map zoom in map units (eg. Max Zoom Allowed:500000, Min Zoom Allowed:10000000). When using google maps use zoom levels 0 - 21 (eg. Max Zoom Allowed:15, Min Zoom Allowed:5)
Property.name: Max Zoom Allowed

Property.description: The minimum map zoom in map units (eg. Max Zoom Allowed:500000, Min Zoom Allowed:10000000). When using google maps use zoom levels 0 - 21 (eg. Max Zoom Allowed:15, Min Zoom Allowed:5)
Property.name: Min Zoom Allowed

Property.description: The data tip
Property.name: Tip

Property.description: The clear button text - leave empty to remove button
Property.name: Clear Button Text

Property.description: The filter button text - leave empty to remove button
Property.name: Filter Button Text

Property.description: Google maps toolbar 'Greyscale' text
Property.name: Google Greyscale Text

Property.description: Google maps toolbar 'Off' text
Property.name: Google Off Text

Property.description: Include the search tool
Property.name: Include Search Tool?

Property.description: Execute an action when a user clicks on a feature in the map
Property.name: Map Click Action

Property.description: Execute an action when a user double clicks on a feature in the map
Property.name: Map Double Click Action

Property.description: Execute an action when a user clicks on a feature in the map
Property.name: Map Click Action

Property.description: Execute an action when a user double clicks on a feature in the map
Property.name: Map Double Click Action

Component.name: Selected Features - Legend
Component.Description: The feature legend component of the report.

Property.description: The title
Property.name: Title

Property.description: Is it visible at start up? Use 'javascript:iaToggle(featureLegend)' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: Visible At Startup?

Property.description: The z-index
Property.name: Z-Index

Property.description: Hidden when the mouse is clicked outside
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Can it be exported?
Property.name: Exportable?

Property.description: The id of the colour scheme to use
Property.name: Colour Scheme

Property.description: The layout of the legend
Property.name: Layout

Property.description: The locale used for formatting numbers, e.g. 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish, 'fr' for French
Property.name: Language

Property.description: The default number of decimal places to be shown for data values.
Property.name: Decimal Places

Property.description: The selection mode
Property.name: Selection Mode

Property.description: The data for the legend
Property.name: Data Source

Property.description: The legend classification type
Property.name: Classification

Property.description: The default number of decimal places to be shown for legend values.
Property.name: Decimal Places

Property.description: The text displayed for features that have 'No Data' or null values
Property.name: 'No Data' Value

Property.description: No data colour used in legend
Property.name: 'No Data' Colour

Property.description: The legend breaks - a semi-colon delimited list of values of the form '0;10;20;30'
Property.name: Map - Legend Breaks

Property.description: The legend labels - a semi-colon delimited list of labels of the form 'low;medium;high'. Relies on 'Legend Breaks' being set
Property.name: Map - Legend Labels

Property.description: The custom classifier property value contains one of 'equalInterval', 'quantile', 'natural', 'continuous' or 'standardDeviation'
Property.name: Custom Classifier Property Id

Property.description: The custom colours property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of colours of the form '#ffff00;rgb(155,234,100);#0000ff'
Property.name: Custom Colours Property Id

Property.description: The custom breaks property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of values of the form '0;10;20;80'
Property.name: Custom Breaks Property Id

Property.description: The custom labels property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of labels of the form 'high;medium;low'
Property.name: Custom Labels Property Id

Property.description: The custom palette property value contains a reference to a palettes name.
Property.name: Custom Palette Property Id

Property.description: The 'Equal Interval' text
Property.name: Equal Interval Text

Property.description: The 'Quantile' text
Property.name: Quantile Text

Property.description: The 'Natural Break' text
Property.name: Natural Break Text

Property.description: The 'Continuous' text
Property.name: Continuous Text

Property.description: The 'Standard Deviation' text
Property.name: Standard Deviation Text

Property.description: The size of the interval to use for standard deviation
Property.name: Standard Deviation Interval

Property.description: The text for band 1 of the standard deviation classification
Property.name: Band 1 Text

Property.description: The text for band 2 of the standard deviation classification
Property.name: Band 2 Text

Property.description: The text for band 3 of the standard deviation classification
Property.name: Band 3 Text

Property.description: The text for band 4 of the standard deviation classification
Property.name: Band 4 Text

Property.description: The text for band 5 of the standard deviation classification
Property.name: Band 5 Text

Property.description: The text for band 6 of the standard deviation classification
Property.name: Band 6 Text

Property.description: The text displayed for emailing the report
Property.name: Email Report Text
Property.value: Email report - copy and paste link into email

Property.description: The text displayed for embedding the report
Property.name: Embed Report Text
Property.value: Embed report - copy and paste html into web page

Property.description: The symbol to use for point data
Property.name: Shape
Property.choices: circle;diamond;star;triangle up;triangle down;triangle right;triangle left;arrow up;arrow down;arrow right;arrow left;plus;x

Property.description: The smallest size that will be used when displaying proportional symbols
Property.name: Min Size

Property.description: The largest size that will be used when displaying proportional symbols
Property.name: Max Size

Property.description: The smallest size that will be used when displaying lines
Property.name: Min Width

Property.description: The largest size that will be used when displaying lines
Property.name: Max Width

Property.description: The text displayed for saving exported images
Property.name: Save Image Text

Property.description: Should the legend type panel be displayed?
Property.name: Show Legend Type Panel?

Property.description: Should the legend tools be displayed?
Property.name: Show Legend Tools?

Property.description: Should the palette panel be displayed?
Property.name: Show Palette Panel?

Property.description: Should the size panel be displayed?
Property.name: Show Size Panel?

Property.description: Use a scrollable layout for smaller screen sizes?
Property.name: Activate Responsive Design?

Property.description: Include images in scrollable layout?
Property.name: Include Images?

Property.description: The screen width at which the scrollable layout is activated.
Property.name: Change Width

Variable.description: The name of the current geography
The name of the current theme
The name of the current indicator
The name of the current indicator's date (if it has one)
The lower limit of the current indicator
The upper limit of the current indicator
